name: UHarc Compressed Archive
summary: Learn about .UHA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: UHarc archives created with UHarc 0.4 are not compatible with later versions, such as UHarc 0.6, and vice versa. UnUHarc, included with UHarc 0.6 can be used to decompress UHarc archives created with version 0.6.

description: Windows file archive compressed using UHarc compression; may create smaller archives than .RAR compression, but decompression typically takes longer.
